name: SuperTrack
description:
Description

This is my entry for the Indie Game Squad Game Jam 192 and was created over 8 days.

The Theme was "When we were young"

Building fun tracks for cars to go on was something I loved doing as a child, and testing to see if I'd be able to get the car to travel along the whole way without falling off. So this game is a tribute to that.

Controls

The game is controlled exclusively by the onscreen controls. First use the buttons along the top to create your track, and when you're ready press the Run button on the right hand side to see the car ride along.

You can press the Build button on the right hand side to modify your track.
